# scheduledWorkouts

**Instance Property**

An array of all the workouts scheduled by your app.

## Declaration

```swift
final var scheduledWorkouts: [ScheduledWorkoutPlan] { get async }
```

## Managing scheduled workouts

- **maxAllowedScheduledWorkoutCount**: The maximum number of workouts your app can schedule.
- **markComplete(_:at:)**: Marks the workout as complete.
- **remove(_:at:)**: Removes the scheduled workout.
- **removeAllWorkouts()**: Removes all scheduled workouts.

items.description: The maximum number of workouts your app can schedule.
